text: Abdul Qadir Nuristani (born 9 April 1927-died 29 April 1978) was an Afghan Minister of the Interior during the Republic of Afghanistan. Abdul Qadir had been a Chief of Police. He was noted for his strict adherence to his beliefs. He replaced minister Faiz Mohammad, a purged Parchamite, in September 1975. Abdul Qadir died on 29 April 1978 in the Saur Revolution. == References == Category:Year of birth missing Category:1978 deaths Category:Police officers Category:Afghan politicians Category:People murdered in Asia Category:20th- century Afghan people
title: Abdul Qadir Nuristani
